com.mozilla.secops.alert

Class Alert

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozilla.secops.alert.Alert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Alert
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Global standardized class representing alerting output from pipelines

    • Method Detail

      • hasCorrectFields

        public Boolean hasCorrectFields()
        Determine if an alert has all mandatory fields set correctly

        Pipelines should call this on any Alert object that is going to be submitted to ensure it will not be dropped by the output transforms.

        Returns:
        True if alert has correct fields

      • assemblePayload

        public String assemblePayload()
        Assemble a complete payload buffer that contains alert metadata information in addition to the alert payload.
        Returns:
        Assembled payload string

      • setSummary

        public void setSummary(String summary)
        Set alert summary
        Parameters:
        summary - Alert summary string

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary()
        Get alert summary
        Returns:
        Summary string

      • setNotifyMergeKey

        public void setNotifyMergeKey(String key)
        Set alert merge key for notifications in metadata

        If a merge key is set in metadata for an alert, some output transforms will utilize this key to group any other alerts with the same key together to minimize generation of similar/duplicate alerts.

        Parameters:
        key - Merge key for alert notifications

      • getNotifyMergeKey

        public String getNotifyMergeKey()
        Get alert merge key for notifications from metadata
        Returns:
        Merge key for alert notifications

      • setSeverity

        public void setSeverity(Alert.AlertSeverity severity)

        Parameters:
        severity - Severity

        public String getMetadataValue(AlertMeta.Key key)
        Return a specific metadata value
        Parameters:
        key - Key to return data for
        Returns:
        Value string, null if not found

      • getCustomMetadataValue

        public String getCustomMetadataValue(String key)
        Return a custom metadata value

        Custom metadata includes arbitrary keys that are not standardized, such as keys set in configuration ticks. This method should not be used under normal circumstances.

        Parameters:
        key - Key to return data for
        Returns:
        Value string, null if not found

      • setMetadataValue

        public boolean setMetadataValue(AlertMeta.Key key,
                                String value)
        Change an existing metadata value

        If the key does not exist, it will be added. Note that if multiple entries exist with the same key, this method will only change the first encountered.

        Parameters:
        key - Key to set
        value - Value to set for key
        Returns:
        True if key was successfully set

      • getMetadata

        public ArrayList<AlertMeta> getMetadata()
        Get alert metadata
        Returns:
        Alert metadata

                           String value)

        Parameters:
        key - Key
        value - Value
        Returns:
        True if key was successfully set

      • addMetadata

        public boolean addMetadata(AlertMeta.Key key,
                           List<String> value)
        Add metadata as a list of values

        Only valid for LIST type fields.

        Parameters:
        key - Key
        value - List
        Returns:
        True if key was successfully set

      • addCustomMetadata

        public void addCustomMetadata(String key,
                              String value)
        Set a custom metadata value

        Custom metadata includes arbitrary keys that are not standardized, such as keys set in configuration ticks. This method should not be used under normal circumstances.

        Parameters:
        key - Key to set
        value - Value to set
